articles.author: Emma Grimshaw
articles.title: Five areas in Somerset now have some of the highest Covid rates in the country - Somerset Live
articles.description: A huge area in Somerset now has worryingly high cases
articles.content:
Five areas in Somerset have Covid-19 infection rates above 400 - potentially keeping our county in the strictest measures for longer.
Somerset was placed into Tier 3 restrictions on Boxing Day, afte… [+1742 chars]
